title: Event Horizon
description: An events app that allows users to see event details that are nearby on a Google Map. Has in-app QR scanning for check-ins and details. User persmissions are handled based on roles.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: This is a project made to showcase my skills as well as learn react, animations, and more about front-end.

title: Tech Notes
description: This is a project made to learn the MERN stack by building a simple notes app with user login. User persmissions are handled by json-web-tokens. Redux library used for state management
